description: This rare end-unit townhome offers unmatched privacy on the quiet side of the complex. Enjoy a private garage, a separate garden-level entrance to a bedroom with ensuite and patio — ideal for guests, in-laws, or a home office.The main floor features an inviting bay window, electric fireplace, engineered h/w & an open-concept kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and a convenient powder room. Upstairs, two spacious bedrooms (including a bay-windowed primary with double closets) offer peace & quiet being a corner end unit. Walk to Rocky Point, Brewers Row, SkyTrain, West Coast Express, schools, shops, and more. Perfect for families, professionals, or investors — just add your personal touch to MAKE IT YOUR HOME!
